title: Price Reduced   1911 T 206 Al Mattern Piedmont card.

posts.post_title: Price Reduced   1911 T 206 Al Mattern Piedmont card.
posts.post_content:
For sale. 1911 T 206 Al Mattern Boston, Natl. Piedmont card.

The front is gouged & has stains & corner wear.

The back has corner wear & small cardboard loss.

$12 PPD. Paypal or M.O. or personal check. personal check will have to clear.

Good Luck.

Lee

Ok, Guys lets try $8 PPD. terms same as above.

Lee
email sent. I'll take him!  Thanks lee, lmk.
